verbs.description: [ARG0: CNN 's Jim Acosta] [V: confronted] [ARG1: White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders] [ARG2: for a comment she made earlier in today 's briefing about Trump administration 's commitment to a free press] .

CNN 's Jim Acosta confronted White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders for [ARG1: a comment] [ARG0: she] [V: made] [ARGM-TMP: earlier] [ARGM-LOC: in today 's briefing] about Trump administration 's commitment to a free press .
